accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

did.unittitle: A.L. Miller's Badges - Brotherhood of Locomotive Firemen and Enginemen, St. Louis (Lodge 573)
Cuff Links and a Charm Bracelet

scopecontent.p: Brotherhood of Locomotive Firemen and Enginemen

did.unittitle: Limited Edition Ornament - Santa Fe, 125 Years of Quality Service (1868-1993)
UTU - Money clips, tie tacks, tie clips, buttons, cuff links, service pins, gold UTU coins
BLF&E - pins, key chains, buttons, money clip, etc.
Plaque presented to A.L. Miller for Most Valuable Player on our team for 17 consectutive years. A record. -- General Committee of Adjustment UTU-EAJ & SF Proper
Switch Keys on a key ring and souvenir pencil from the 37th BLF&E Convention
BLF&E - decks of cards ; UTU - Business cards
BLF&E note pads and small portfolios
